description.text: Abeyancesuppresses the effects of a single curse on a creature. It does not restore any damage or drain that might have been caused by the curse. Abeyancecannot suppress curses that cannot be removed by remove curse, but it can suppress curses such as lycanthropy that require remove cursealong with additional measures. An individual curse can be suppressed only once by abeyance, even if cast by a different caster.
